
{{alias}}( re, im )
    Returns the absolute value and phase of a complex number.

    Parameters
    ----------
    re: number
        Real component.

    im: number
        Imaginary component.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array<number>
        Absolute value and phase, respectively.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 5.0, 3.0 )
    [ ~5.83, ~0.5404 ]

    See Also
    --------
